name: WhatsApp Web - Serious Blue Design
description:
WhatsApp Web (FAQ) will get the Serious Blue Design as well

Update coming soon, maybe.

user.name: Dave Tucker
user.about:
Hi I'm Dave Tucker,
and I like it to create some styles for some Websites.

View my newest Style, the style 149854 or style 159235 and the newest version of style 131618.

If you want a crazy style, view this one: style 132863.

additional_info:
v0.1.0 - Initial release
v0.1.1 - It's now possible to change the background image
v0.1.2 - A small improvement in the design of the speech bubble
v0.1.3 - Text color and the selection icon revised
v0.1.4 - Intro color and image are now blue again
v0.1.5 - Background color from the text window is bow blue and some elements are now blue again
v0.1.6 - Some elements are now blue again
v0.1.7 - Some elements are now blue again, like background
